title: Cricket Professional Friction Free Pick Comb
description: Proprietary blend of polymers to reduce friction caused by brushing and styling hair-creating a smooth finish. Bristles are ion infused with tourmaline to impart moisture into the hair shaft, reducing static electricity and creating incredible smooth shine. Attractive ergonomic design with non-slip grip. Ideal for lifting or fluffing to add volume.

title: Selsun Blue Dandruff Shampoo, Moisturizing with Aloe for Dry Scalp and Hair, 11 Ounce
description: Selenium Sulfite 1%. Dandruff control for dry scalp and hair. Healthier hair. Healthier scalp. Doctor recommended.

title: Spornette's Luxury Cushion, Small, 3 Ounce
description: Spornette's small uxury cushion brush has a great velvet finish that feels great in your hands! It has boar and nylon bristles. 2 sizes to choose from.
